titles.title: Bank Deposit Insurance Amendments of 1993
To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to permit the continued insurance of deposits in minority- and women-owned banks by the Bank Deposit Financial Assistance Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance

bill.summary: 11/8/1993--Introduced. Bank Deposit Insurance Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to provide continued Federal deposit insurance for trust funds held on deposit by a minority- or women-owned insured depository institution as trustee pursuant to any revocable trust established under the Bank Deposit Financial Assistance Program of the Department of Energy.
